replies.body: Challenge accepted.

Good luck! 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Completed with 2.8 million points :)

However i accidentally copied my match history link and lost the one showing post game with club tags does this still count? (i posted a screenshot from match history instead of postgame)

As long as the screenshot that you submit is from the league of legends client and shows all of you with the same club tag it's all good! Good work getting the number of points you needed.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Ah rip in match history it doesn't show club tag i guess we'll have to do it again then.
Good luck, you got this!
Re-done and submitted hopefully you'll find the right on and not the one missing the tags :P
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I've submitted a successful game (2.75million points +) with 5 of us with the same clan tag, but I've noticed our entire team has not received the RP reward, whilst others have. 
Is it possible that ours was not eligible in some way? Could I confirm?
Thanks!

Hey BlueberryCrêpe!

The screenshot you linked us was unavailable:
https://imgur.com/a/cih13KQ

If you still have the screenshot and can get it to us, we may be able to work something out for you and your team.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=Fn8VBb95,comment-id=00120001,timestamp=2018-10-20T14:30:15.122+0000)
>
> Hey BlueberryCrêpe!
> 
> The screenshot you linked us was unavailable:
> https://imgur.com/a/cih13KQ
> 
> If you still have the screenshot and can get it to us, we may be able to work something out for you and your team.

Hi! 
Yep, I have the screenshot here on this link: http://puu.sh/BOuHE/4b0c3a73db.jpg 
Hopefully it works.
Thanks!
I'll pass it on to our lovely Red friends and see if they can't get that sorted out for you :)

I'll pass this onto Seras and Elam, ask them to check for you (I would myself, but I wasn't involved in validating entries). It could take some time, so just sit tight for now.

Just to confirm, the screenshot submitted with the entry was of the post-game lobby, not match history? Had a few other teams with that issue who missed out because match history doesn't show club tags.
Should be all fixed up for you now :)

~~Let me do some digging for you. I wasn't around for the prize giving out..stuff so I missed out on some info.~~

~~It might take a bit to touch base with the other Organisers so hold tight.~~

EDIT: Your team had a duplicate entry removed, and the entry we didn't remove (because it had an SS and not a match history) apparently missed the 0 in your name so that's why you didn't receive your prize. 

I don't see any issues with getting that sent out, but don't quote me on that in case there is, and it might take a bit, I'll let you know as soon as I can!
Hey so, if we submit a successful 2.75 million game and then do it again with a different group of people, how will that work in terms of eligibilty of each group?

Hey CyberiumShadow, good question!

When you play with a different group of people, I assume that this is because you want to help your friends out to get through the challenge as well. If this is the case if your name is submitted twice we will just be sure to remove any duplicate summoner names on our list, just to make it easy on our end make it so someone else goes through the form for the second group.

I hope this helps, if you need any further clarification let me know

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Thank you for verifying my entry Elam, the team all appreciate it very much. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Just an Inquiry as to when the rewards are being shifted out, as my group is yet to receive.
(I was not the one to submit though.)

Sorry! Missed this one. Your team was ineligible for prizing because you submitted Match History and not post game. As match history does not show what club tags are used, we could not use it for this contest's purposes.

Disappointing but fair enough, though...
Are we able to very lately re-submit if the correct screenshot is found......?

EDIT:
Just Incase,
https://imgur.com/4oSw7FV
Given you posted that comment before our wrap up post went out (and we just missed it like silly people) I should be able to work something out for you guys. Hang tight on that one.
So you should have all received your RP now :) (there won't be a popup for it). Sorry for the delay!
Riot made me change my name, so instead of Adolf Quitler (From Godigimon's entry) it is now Pïerrøt for prizing.

>Inappropriate summoner names are also not allowed and will disqualify that player

Submitting with an inappropriate name made you ineligible for prizing. A name change after the contest has closed does not make you eligible retroactively.
Just checking but the post here says it ends on the 10th (as in game mode). Does that mean i can still do it after the regular missions expire and odyssey will still be up?

The official missions and the Extraction mode itself are set to end at ~5pm AEST on Oct 10th (if I'm not mistaken), so you will have until then to achieve any Odyssey event goals. The submission end-time was made 11:59pm on the 10th so that teams would have extra time after the mode ends to ensure they've submitted their entry to the Boards contest.

Nice I might have time to do it if they keep it up till tomorrow. Didn't have the time for it tonight. 

Edit: Nevermind turns out the game mode went down today instead. Was still an enjoyable event though.

is my ingame now offensive
IGN :sleepnut
It's a bit borderline but we've agreed you're all good for this one.
Nah no way its a perspective driven offensive name ya feel. Could be just a sleep cashew nut??

Heya, so our team hasn't received the prize yet either, at least not to my knowledge. We did complete the points challenge and post a screenshot of the post-game lobby. We all had the same club tags as well.
Were we not eligible?
There were no entries at all, eligible or otherwise, containing your summoner name.
The entry was made, we were even on the highscore leaderboard for Oceania for a while when it was early in the contest. Our leader is named 1 11 2002

So I've found your entry, it was submitted with a Match History screenshot not a post game screenshot. As MH doesn't show club tags, we couldn't use such screenshots for entries, hence why we asked for post game.

Other manual/late prizing went out 2 months ago, and we pushed to get one or two quite some time after the contest ended, but this is well outside of those bounds. There is no longer a way for us to give out more RP for this event, even if you still have a screenshot.
Alright, no worries. Thank chu.
Have all the prizes gone out yet? I'm still waiting, I did take part in 2 different team submissions and some of the members from one team have got the RP.
Do I need to contact an emissary directly or will someone respond to my post?
Hey man, so you received your RP on Oct 12th. There isn't a popup that goes with these kind of redemptions unfortunately, so that may have contributed some confusion.

Hey sorry I missed this one! I was away for a while and not watching the post as closely. Your name was on the list to receive prizing so everything should have been good there. I'll follow up with the Reds and see what happened.
wow just saw this too late now?

>All entries must be submitted by October 10th, 2018, 23:59 AEST, any submitted after will be disqualified.

You still have a few days to enter :)
I just wanna know if our entry is valid and such or if we have to redo it before the deadline, is there any way we can find confirmation of that? I'm the captain btw.
Elam went ahead and confirmed your entry, you're all good :)
How will we know if our entry was successfully confirmed? will we get told through dm? is there any info on when we get the reward? ty!

My team managed to get 2.68million point with 2 augments and a 5th man DC'd (for the whole game)... {{sticker:cass-cry}} 
See match history: 
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/220096278/200917324?tab=overview

I've submitted as though its above 2.75million but do we have to try again? or can you make an exception and grant us the RP prize out of sheer effort.`

Wow that sucks, and it's a very impressive effort! Unfortunately we're very limited as is with what we can do for prizing, and making an exception even once is a slippery slope. I'm sorry, but you'll have to resubmit with the full score. Look on the bright side though, if you can his 2.68 with only 4 players, getting the 2.75 shouldn't be all that hard now :)
